trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Thousand Oaks
There were no other sightings in Thousand Oaks on or around October 27th 2012
Summary: I was shooting my daughters soccer game and noticed a very reflective object almost straight overhead I had a 300 millemeter lens high shutter speed and took 8 pictures of the object before i lost it.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my daughters soccer game this afternoon about 2:30 pm pst. I noticed a very bright reflective object .First It caught my attention because of how bright it was. I pulled my camera up to look at it and Icouldn't see it.Then after maybe 30 secs it was clearly visible. i took 8 pictures at high shutter speed. I was in disbelief at what I was seeing. I eventually lost the object. When I went home I loaded the chip on the computer and was shocked. I could see it clearly. It must have been rotating because it was a different look in the pictures. I also noticed 2 orbs in the object which I didn't notice until I looked at the picture.The orbs were reddish in color and seemed to be in geometric formation.
